title: I call Jungle first.
body:
Guy calls jungle five seconds later and instalocks Lee Sin. That just about sums up Lee Sin players.

#removeleesin2015

replies.body:
If in Ranked and he has higher pick order than you then yes he Can just lock, it would still be d1ck move tho but he can.

In Normals though, since how Riot's servers work you can never be too sure as you always see yourself call first, so it's always good to check from other players besides you and the one who are competing for that particular position.
Its not a d*ck move at all, if they're above you then they have the right to pick what they want, you want that lane and so do they its just unfortunate that they're above you.

> [{quoted}](name=NigguhDamus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uMAFIAOB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-01T06:02:41.331+0000)
>
> Its not a d*ck move at all, if they're above you then they have the right to pick what they want, you want that lane and so do they its just unfortunate that they're above you.

To apply your logic you need to be like, really REALLY nice
Everyone needs to be nice, there's no exception.

It's always nice to hear out what your teammate has to say on what he prefer to pick before you selfishly lock your champ of choice.

Yes you have every right to, but it would be nice.
I was assuming that the person said he wanted to do that role and was overall communicating, not instalocking.

At least 65% of Lee Sin players I have played with are total assholes. My normals MMR is very high so I get put with golds and plats often, and a good portion of the cancerous Lee Sins are Gold or higher.

Then you're just unlucky...it's mere coincidences trust me. There are only two general Lee Sin player bases...the first is the silent one who feeds and builds a Triforce or something who sucks at Lee and the other is the one who makes all the plays (in appropriate comparison to their level/rank) while taking all the kills which also somewhat causes some rage.......

Unfortunately I used to be the 2nd type of Lee until I thought yeah I should stop taking everything...
